subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Fencing (Sport)
lead_paragraph: When the Nigerian fencer Jacqueline Esimaje-Heath’s Olympic ambitions unexpectedly ended in 2004, a door opened for Mariel Zagunis of the United States.
snippet: When the Nigerian fencer Jacqueline Esimaje-Heath’s Olympic ambitions unexpectedly ended in 2004, a door opened for Mariel Zagunis of the United States.
